story.narrative: In order to communicate effectively to the business some functionality As a development team I want to use Behaviour-Driven Development
story.name: product_catalog_service_story.story
story.scenarios: Scenario:A scenario to test all the categories returned Given product service is running When the service api <providedUrl> is invoked Then check the statusCode <statusCode> and the response <response>

story.narrative: In order to communicate effectively to the business some functionality As a development team I want to use Behaviour-Driven Development
story.name: order_catalog_service_story.story
story.scenarios: Scenario:A scenario to test all the categories returned Given order service is running When the service api <providedUrl> is invoked for order service with entity <entity> Then check the statusCode <statusCode> match response <response>
